scripts.test:coverage-watch: COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$PWD/ TEST_WATCH=1 meteor test --driver-package meteortesting:mocha
scripts.test:coverage: TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=phantomjs COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_LCOVONLY=1 COVERAGE_OUT_HTML=1 COVERAGE_OUT_TEXT_SUMMARY=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$PWD/ meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha
